description: This file defines a React functional component 'DeviceTable' responsible for displaying and managing a table of devices, including features such as search, filter, sort, pagination, and device actions like delete and ping. It imports external API methods and components, and maintains various internal states for UI control.

methods.name: DeviceTable
methods.description: React functional component that provides a device management UI with filtering, sorting, pagination, and actions.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches device data based on current filters, sorting, and pagination, updating the component state.

methods.name: onSortClick
methods.description: Handles column header click events to toggle sorting order.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Prepares to delete a specified device by opening confirmation dialog.

methods.name: confirmDeleteAction
methods.description: Confirms and executes device deletion, updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: onPing
methods.description: Sends a ping request to the specified device and shows the result as a toast message.
